problem.markdown:
1. Equivalent length of a wide open gate valve is --------------- the equivalent length of a half open gate valve of the same nominal size?
() greater than () lesser than (x) same as
2. Frictional loss in fittings is ----------------- that in straight pipes.
() equal to (x) greater than () smaller than
3. A globe valve is most suitable for applications in which?
() the fluid contains dispersed particles () flow control is required () the valve is required to be either fully open or fully closed (x) One-way flow is required
4. The frictional loss from sudden expansion is proportional to the velocity head in the ------------ conduit
(x) smaller () Larger
5. Globe valve offers ------------ pressure drop than the gate valve
(x) higher () lower () equal
problem.p: 1. Equivalent length of a wide open gate valve is --------------- the equivalent length of a half open gate valve of the same nominal size?
2. Frictional loss in fittings is ----------------- that in straight pipes.
3. A globe valve is most suitable for applications in which?

choicegroup.choice: the valve is required to be either fully open or fully closed

problem.p: 4. The frictional loss from sudden expansion is proportional to the velocity head in the ------------ conduit
5. Globe valve offers ------------ pressure drop than the gate valve
